content: Use this option to deactivate your space temporarily.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a temporary deactivation message for a portal. It appears on a page where an owner can temporarily deactivate their space and is part of the UI when activating or deactivating employee status.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "استخدم هذا الخيار لإلغاء تنشيط إستضافتك مؤقتًا." uses the word "إستضافتك" which translates to "your hosting". The English phrase "your space" refers to a portal or area, not necessarily hosting services. A more accurate translation is needed to reflect the meaning of 'space'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: استخدم هذا الخيار لتعطيل مساحتك مؤقتًا.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Օգտագործեք այս տարբերակը՝ ձեր տարածքը ժամանակավորապես անջատելու համար:' is a literal translation and could be improved for naturalness. 'Deactivate' implies more than just a temporary disable. It might imply a temporary suspension of service.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrasing like 'Օգտագործեք այս տարբերակը՝ ձեր տարածքի ծառայությունը ժամանակավորապես դադարեցնելու համար:' (Use this option to temporarily suspend your space's service).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ປິດການນຳໃຊ້' is a more literal translation of 'deactivate' and might not be the most natural phrasing in Lao. A more common and understandable phrasing might involve using a word that suggests pausing or suspending.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃຊ້ຕົວເລືອກນີ້ເພື່ອຢຸດການນຳໃຊ້ພື້ນທີ່ຂອງທ່ານຊົ່ວຄາວ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'S to možnostjo začasno deaktivirate svoj prostor.' is not the most natural or idiomatic way to convey 'Use this option to deactivate your space temporarily.' A more natural phrasing would use a verb in the imperative mood, similar to the English original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Uporabite to možnost za začasno deaktivacijo svojega prostora.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Koristite ovu opciju da deaktivirate vaš prostor privremeno' is a literal translation and sounds slightly awkward in Serbian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Koristite ovu opciju da privremeno deaktivirate vaš prostor.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koristite ovu opciju da privremeno deaktivirate vaš prostor.
